channel.title: BlazeX - 317 - Like Near Reality! Check media
channel.description:
BlazeX BlazeX is a new server, me and some mates have put this server together to show what we think is best for a server. We thought we'd put it on a VPS and release it to you guys to have fun and enjoy the server we have put together! If you think you could improve it feel free to suggest stuff to owners and we'll think about adding it!
For those who liked Near Reality, this source is quite close.
Features This server has many different features such as; Nex Armours with working Torva Hp, Virtus Hp and Pernix Hp! Lime Whip Death Cape Lava Whip Bronze-Dragon Whip Barrows Whip Gold H'ween Mask White H'ween Mask Pink Party Hat Black Party Hat Sky Party Hat Lava Party Hat Tokhaar-Kal (New fire cape) Completionist Cape Veteren Cape (All capes this style) Fully recoded minigames Source fully recoded Donation Shop Pkp Shop Dungeoneering Armours All bosses! Duel Arena Pest Control Barrows Warriors Guild Tzhaar Cave (With Jad) In-game Highscore board! Vote Shop All PVP items. Chaotics BlazeX Shop All working skills Working TB All spells work Daily server events Active Forums Active Webclient Amazing professional dedicated staff! Hiring! Fully licensed vBulletin Forum
[U][URL=http://"http://www.blazex.net/forums/forum.php"]Forums[/URL][/U]
[U][URL=http://"http://www.blazex.net/forums/forumdisplay.php?5-Webclient"]Webclient[/URL][/U]
[U][URL=http://"http://www.blazex.net/forums/forumdisplay.php?6-Download-Client"]Download Client[/URL][/U]

item.description:
@Specials wrote:

BlazeX
BlazeX is a new server, me and some mates have put this server together to show what we think is best for a server. We thought we’d put it on a VPS and release it to you guys to have fun and enjoy the server we have put together! If you think you could improve it feel free to suggest stuff to owners and we’ll think about adding it!

For those who liked Near Reality, this source is quite close.

Features
This server has many different features such as;
Nex Armours with working Torva Hp, Virtus Hp and Pernix Hp!
Lime Whip
